RT @GeoSIG_Ltd: @LastQuake welcomes all to join a community of #CitizenScience with the new ?LastQuakers? forum on the EMSC website. Chat with others around the world about earthquakes that are happening now, the science of earthquakes, geology, and whatever other topics of interest pop up. :)

RT @BobBrownFndn: Bob Brown Foundation has stopped logging in forest that is Swift Parrot habitat on Tasmania?s east coast. RT @IanFelipeSays: The FDA just granted Emergency Use Authorization for the antibody test I use in the Cure-Hub citizen science project. 
 
 This is the first FDA approval for a test that determines if your antibodies neutralize the virus. 
 
 Contact me if you are interested. 
 
 https://t.co/s5yJv0D3L0
